TopicTitle: Key binding for reloading all parts

Articles.Content:
long version:

I remember once reading in a thread once that there is a keybinding for reloading all parts but i do not remember which thread it was nor the key binding which i require

short version:

What is the keybinding that allows me to reload all parts in game because the KSP wiki didn't say.

You can reload all the parts from the database portion of the alt-f12 debug menu, if I recall correctly.

EDIT: It can only be done in the space centre scene, not the editors.

Edited February 3, 2014 by Supernovy
